title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.36 - Term appointments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.36 - Term appointments

State Regulations

Nothing contained herein shall be deemed to extend the
term of appointment of employees, and all leaves of absence shall, in any
event, terminate upon the expiration of such appointment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
337.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
